title: More than 40 interpretations of seeing a famous player in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a famous player in a dream: There are a large number of famous players who have a large audience in different parts of the world, and many dreamers see them in a dream, such as Messi, Mohamed Salah, and others. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a famous football player in a dream: The dreamer who sees a football player in his dream A famous person should study these lines, so we will explain everything that the vision entails, keeping in mind that it includes negative and positive interpretations depending on the degree of fame of the player and whether he was. He smiles. In the dream or not, and whether the dialogue that took place between him and the fortuneteller was positive or negative: First, a happy face has happy connotations in the vision. If the viewer sees a football player in his dream and his face is smiling and signs of contentment and joy appear on him, then this symbol is worthy of praise and seeing it shows the goodness that is coming to the pioneer: perhaps a lot of money will come to him or urgent needs will be spent on him, and all of this explains that the seasons of sadness will end in his life and soon. It moves to contentment and peace of mind, and if the dreamer sees that the football player is frowning and full of anger, then the dream will contradict what was stated in the previous lines. Secondly, what Al-Nabulsi said about seeing a football player in a dream did not differ at all from what Ibn Shirin mentioned, as he explained that it translates to Nutrition and loss of anxiety.Third Some interpreters interpret this dream from a different angle, which is that if a football player has high morals in reality and everyone attests to his good behavior, then this is a sign that the dreamer takes the same approach as this person in terms of purity of heart. And morals. But if this player was known in his wake for the ugliness of his morals, and his life history was filled with a large number of problems with his teammates, then this scene highlights the dreamer’s poor morals and neglect of his religion, and the vision may indicate. That many problems will befall him soon. Fourth: One of the dreamers asked a jurist to interpret dreams and told him that I saw a famous football player in my dream and I was happy to see him in a dream. The jurist answered and said that the vision was praiseworthy. He confirms the extent of his gentleness with others, and there is no doubt that this characteristic is one of the distinctive characteristics of our master, as he was kind-hearted and forgiving others. Forgiveness and seeking forgiveness are also characteristics of the Lord of Glory. As for the opinion of scholars regarding the characteristic of seeking forgiveness, they said that it is one of the characteristics that brings to a person an unusually positive energy. It makes him more active. And vitality... from a person who is unable to forgive people who have caused him unhappiness in his life. Fifth: The dreamer who sees a football player in his dream may indicate that he is a person with great professional ambition and will achieve it soon. Otherwise, the dreamer may be surrounded by evil people who want to throw him into their nets, and seeing... The football player in his dream is evidence that you are saving him from these people with the help of God Almighty, and because this vision is classified in daydreams, the dreamer must be very cautious and cautious in his dealings with others while he is awake. Seven If the dreamer sees in his dream that he belongs to a football team Featuring the most famous players known in his waking life and

title: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of long hair for a married woman by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen: The dream of long hair for a married woman is one of the dreams that many people have, and the issue is not limited to women, but everyone can have it, men and women. Long hair is one of the things that many people desire, and scholars differed, including Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in the interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. We will also learn about the interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman. The wife of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman. There are many indications and signs that the interpretation of a dream about long hair can bring to married people, as scholars differed in one interpretation of this dream. Among these indicators are the following: Some interpretive scholars have also proven that seeing hair in a dream generally indicates good news and happiness in the dreamer’s life. Likewise, having long hair in a dream indicates a lot of nourishment and longevity. If a woman sees in her dream that her hair If a woman dyes her long hair in a dream, this means that good things will happen to her. The appearance of long hair during sleep is evidence of many children. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin found Some indications of the dream of seeing long hair in a dream, as he saw that this dream carries connotations and signs that come as follows: Ibn Sirin interpreted this dream as evidence of goodness, happiness, and livelihood. Seeing long hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin means long life and recovery of the patient. If If the color of long hair is black, this indicates that the skin will have good complexion. To have long hair in a dream, soft to the touch, indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s health. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen had his diligence in understanding the interpretation of the dream about hair The long hair that the dreamer saw in a dream, and the implications of the interpretation of this dream were as follows: Ibn Shaheen believes that the interpretation of long hair in a dream indicates the dreamer’s fears and problems. If a woman sees her long hair in a dream, this symbolizes the extent of her husband’s faith in her. Seeing black hair Long hair in a dream for a married woman indicates the imminent death of her husband or one of her relatives. If a woman sees that a man with long hair looks poor, this is a sign that she will avoid evil. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a married woman from Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the leading scholars in the field of dream interpretation. It has many well-known interpretations of this science. In Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of a married woman’s dream, he saw that her long hair carries the following connotations and symbols: If the hair in the dream is long, this symbolizes long life and abundance of money. If you see long, soft hair in a dream, this means that the dreamer will recover from illness. If one sees in Dreaming that his hair is long and braided, this symbolizes good behavior. title: Interpretation of a yellow snake in a dream in detail

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we show you the interpretation of the yellow snake in a dream, according to what scholars and jurists have interpreted. Snakes are reptiles, they have many shapes and colors, and sometimes the sleeper sees its yellow color in its image. The dream, and he is afraid of this vision, and when he wakes up he is more interested in its meaning, so he turns to scholars and jurists to interpret the dream he saw, and scholars say that the meaning of the dream varies according to the social status of the person who dreamed it... You see, and for this we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia article the interpretation A dream of seeing yellow snakes for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a yellow snake in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a yellow snake for a single womanDream interpretation scholars say that seeing a yellow snake in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that the dreamer is hiding something important from her family and that the vision warns her of the people around her. If an unmarried girl sees the yellow snake in her home, this indicates that someone is trying to approach her and harm her. The presence of the yellow snake in the single’s room in her dream is a sign of the problems that this girl is suffering from, and it also indicates the emergence of disputes between her and the people around her. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman: If a married woman sees a yellow snake in her dream, this means that there are many disagreements with her husband, and it also shows the instability of her life. Seeing a yellow snake in a married woman’s home in her dream means that one of her family members will get sick. If a married woman sees in Her dream is that her husband has become a yellow snake, then this vision is a warning to her against deceiving and betraying her husband. If a married woman dreams during sleep that she skins a yellow snake and separates it from its skin, then this is a good vision that indicates that this woman is very intelligent, has a strong personality, and loves her family and home. In general, seeing a yellow snake in a married woman’s dream is an unpleasant vision, unless the woman kills or kills her. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a pregnant woman: Seeing a yellow snake wandering around a pregnant woman’s house in a dream indicates the difficulties that the dreamer will face when she gives birth. If a pregnant woman sees A small snake in her dream and its color is yellow, then this vision indicates the presence of some marital disputes and her attempt to resolve these problems and differences. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that a yellow snake is wandering around her and does not harm her, then this is a good vision that indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and this vision portends the birth of a healthy child. If a divorced woman sees a yellow snake walking behind her in her dream, this is a sign that she will be exposed to many difficulties and problems in the near future. And if she dreams that she is eating the meat of a yellow snake, this is a good vision that portends her victory over people. Those who conspire against her. Seeing a yellow snake being cut and cooked in a divorced woman’s dream means that she will get a lot of money, but she will be hurt because of this money. Seeing killing a yellow snake in a divorced woman’s dream is a good dream, indicating relief from distress and freedom from worries.

title: Seeing bees in a dream for a man

preview.html: We will see from the website gptafser.com/ the interpretation of seeing bees in the dream of a single woman, a man, and a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing bees in a dream for a single girl: seeing a single girl in her dream that a large group of bees began to approach her. It states that this girl is ambitious and seeks to achieve a beautiful future for herself. Watching a single woman sitting next to a beehive shows that she is a serious girl and has different experiences in life. The interpretation of seeing bees in the dream of an unmarried woman heralds the presence of good and abundant nutrition for this coming period of her life. In the event that the unmarried woman sees that the bees are approaching her, and she begins In her sting while she was trying to escape from him. Indicate problems in the life of a single woman that she is trying to solve and stay away from. A bee sting in a dream indicates a desire that a girl wants to achieve and will soon be fulfilled. The interpretation of seeing bees in large quantities in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates happiness The good and old that fill the life of an unmarried girl. The features of happiness that appear on the dreamer’s face when she sees bees indicate the engagement of this girl, and God knows best. Seeing bees in a dream symbolizes success in life. If she is a student, she will obtain the highest grades in her academic level. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing bees in a dreamInterpretation of seeing bees in a dream for a married womanA married woman sees bees in a dream and predicts that she will become pregnant soon.Enjoying seeing bees in a dream indicates a change in the mother’s life for the better and the decent life she lives.Seeing a bee sting someone Relatives of a married woman indicate the fulfillment of desires in the coming period. Numerous groups of bees gathered around the viewer, and she was happy to see the bees. It indicates the amount of joy that will soon enter her home and her heart with the news that she was waiting for. Bees in a married woman’s dream, means a lot of sustenance and goodness from God. Seeing bees filling the wife’s bedroom indicates the beautiful relationship that the dreamer has with her husband. It expresses their understanding and love. If a married woman sees that bees are walking in groups and circles and begin to circle around her. It portends goodness and happiness and can indicate travel abroad. Seeing Bees multiply in a dream, and they multiply greatly, indicating good food and better than what exists. Often, the more bees there are, the more sustenance and many blessings. Interpretation of seeing bees in a dream about a person and its meaningIf you see a man in his dream that he is looking at bees , it means that he will get a lot of money soon. The presence of bees in the fortuneteller’s workplace indicates a promotion in his position, and perhaps an increase in his salary. Many ants surround a person in a dream, symbolizing a deal in which he will win and bring a lot of money. Perhaps it is a project that he has invested in. All his strength to get it and he will achieve great success in it. Seeing bees gathering in the dreamer’s house indicates the happy relationship that unites the man with his wife. Bees in a dream indicate an upcoming marriage to a man close to him. It promises finding a new job that he was searching for a lot.

title: Interpretation of the takbir in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the takbir in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Takbeer is one of the Sunnahs transmitted by the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and his companions. It is repeated in an excellent manner and on Islamic occasions to a large extent, and it contains many meanings in glorifying God Almighty, and they carry many positive and blessed meanings when one sees them or hears them in a dream, so in this article In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of the takbir in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the takbir in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says: Seeing the takbir in a dream indicates the goodness of the dreamer, his piety, his good reputation among his people, and that he glorifies God Almighty. If the takbir is in the Friday prayer, it indicates a journey in which the founder gains knowledge, status, and livelihood. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone in a dream: Growing up in a dream indicates happiness and the arrival of goodness, and if an unmarried woman sees it, it indicates the following: When an unmarried woman hears the takbir of the Eid in full, without abbreviation. This indicates that her condition has changed from sadness to joy and she achieves what she wants and seeks to achieve. If you hear the takbir for a period of time, this means that you have overcome the difficulties that she was going through and the next time in her life will be better. And if the unmarried woman is the one who repeated Takbir herself, this indicates that she is married to a righteous man and will give birth to a righteous son. It declares the righteousness of his character, his repentance from constantly committing sins, and his adherence to the remembrance of God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Takbir in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees Takbir in her dream, this is good news that will bring her sustenance, happiness, and liberation. Of problems and difficulties. Seeing the Eid takbirs indicates guidance, pleasing God, and closeness to Him in obedience, in addition to God Almighty’s forgiveness of sins. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the takbirs in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees herself glorifying God indicates the approaching date of her birth, and heralds an easy birth and a good child. And healthy. As for hearing the takbeers of many people, it indicates the disappearance of worry, relief from distress, and a change in one’s condition to happiness and emptiness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the takbeer in a dream for a man: Ibn Sirin said: Seeing the same man repeating the takbir is evidence of staying away from sins and staying away from forbidden things. Seeing the takbeer in a dream may be for a man. The corrupt person is a warning to him and a call to repentance, abandoning immorality, and returning to the straight path. A person may be dissatisfied with himself and his actions, and sometimes he feels guilty and remorseful, so these feelings are translated into takbir in a dream. Seeing a man in a dream victorious over enemies, just like seeing takbir after Glorifying God, indicates a change in circumstances for the better. If the dreamer is sick and sees himself speaking with the takbir, then this dream warns him of a speedy recovery, and if he is imprisoned, his distress will go away, and if he is in debt, then he will be exonerated. Interpretation of a dream about seeing jeans swell in a dream. Seeing jeans in a dream afflicts The dreamer is experiencing fear and anxiety, which makes him rush to search for its interpretation in the hope that this interpretation will bring him peace. If the takbeer for the jinn is valid, this indicates

Seeing jeans in a dream afflicts The dreamer is experiencing fear and anxiety, which makes him rush to search for its interpretation in the hope that this interpretation will bring him peace. If the takbeer for the jinn is valid, this indicates

title: The meanings of marriage in a dream in detail

preview.html: The concept of a dream about marriage: There are symbols that indicate marriage. It is emotional, so if you see in your dream a change in place or something that symbolizes a move, it is undoubtedly marriage, and this is because with your marriage your status and place of residence changes most of the time. Shroud, because in it the person moves from the state of this world to another, and marriage It means moving from one house to another. The strange guest enters your home. Passport, because there is a similarity in the name with the word passport, as well as with the name Asim or a name. Praying in the direction opposite to the Muslim’s qiblah. Paying attention to the call to prayer because it is propaganda and announcement, as well as marriage. Seeing the Qur’an, because it symbolizes To the terminology of the Qur’an. The dwelling for marriage has peace and mercy, especially if the house is in good and tidy condition. Marriage symbols for single people: Wearing a flowery dress similar to wedding dresses in your country. The shoes and their condition should be checked, if they are comfortable, this means a happy marriage. Abaya, wearing the abaya means that your partner He will protect you and hold you. New clothes in general symbolize marriage. Jewelry, its name. If it is a ring, then putting the ring on your finger or someone else’s finger means close marriage. The crown and the necklace, a symbol of the high status that the girl will have in her husband’s house, but it is made of gold Not good. Seeing a bicycle, especially if it is silver, means a happy married life. Seeing eyeliner, or moving from one state to another. Dreaming of killing a woman. Pay attention to yourself in the mirror. Signs of marriage for single people. Death. If you see yourself dying, this means that you are on a date with the cage. Al-Dhahabi, review your accounts. Seeing our master Muhammad, or hearing his names in a dream, the Sunnah of the Prophet is marriage. Seeing our master Zechariah is also a sign of marriage in a dream. If someone you know or do not know sees and tells you that you will get married. Kings because the woman owns the house And she takes care of his affairs after marriage. If a man sees that he is watering the land, it is considered a sign of marriage in the dream. Driving a car, the car symbolizes a woman and seeing the car entering the house means that your new wife will enter your house. Symbols of approaching marriage in a dream There are symbols of marriage in a dream for a man And a girl, for example, when you see a lion, this means that your husband will be a man of great status. As for seeing yourself in a woman, this means the other half of you, and in food you eat good-tasting sweets, or to meet your family at a feast. As for dating, it is a source of livelihood, and it can be marriage and luxury. Happy life to you. If you have a vision or dream and see signs and symbols in your dream, please leave a comment below the article, as the Shamloul website will be happy to interpret and answer you.

title: Interpretation of seeing a school in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing school in a dream carries many different connotations and messages that vary depending on the social and psychological state of the person in real life, in addition to the course and nature of the dream. Scientists generally interpreted the dream as a sign of ignoring sadness and unhappiness. Seeing school in a dream Seeing school in a dream is evidence of an attempt to escape from real life and ignore problems and crises, as the dreamer suffers from an unstable psychological state as a result of the many pressures and responsibilities he bears in his life. School in a dream It is a sign of confusion and inability to make decisions correctly, as a person suffers in his life from many problems and obstacles that stand in his way and prevent him from reaching his goal and desire. Dreaming of seeing a school in a dream indicates that he has fallen into a major problem in which the dreamer needs to Help and support from all those close to him. Seeing a school in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a school in a dream is a sign of the knowledge that a person acquires and helps him reach a prominent position that raises his standing among people and makes him a source of respect and appreciation from everyone. Dreaming of a school in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to solve problems. And the difficulties that stand in his way, which he can overcome successfully without suffering any loss that could negatively affect his stability and life. School in a dream is an indication of a feeling of fear and anxiety when facing a new problem, and the dreamer needs a long time to be able to accept it and adapt to it. Vision School in a dream for single people: Seeing a school in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the dreamer’s good qualities of good morals, love and tenderness towards others, in addition to helping them solve problems and get rid of the sadness that disturbs their lives. Feeling fear when entering school in a girl’s dream is evidence of making some decisions. The task that affects her life in general, in addition to ending sadness and anxiety and getting rid of the difficult problems she faced in the previous period. Entering school with his friends in a dream is a sign of the coming period in which the dreamer will witness many positive events and receive some good news that improves his psychological state. For the better. What is the interpretation of seeing a classmate in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a classmate in an unmarried girl’s dream crying a lot indicates that she is going through a difficult period in which she needs the dreamer’s help to be able to overcome it safely without any major loss that may have negative consequences for her. More. Seeing a good colleague in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the fulfillment of all aspirations and desires and the fulfillment of her dream in real life after a long period of effort, research, and not giving in to the difficult reality. Seeing a colleague who had disagreements with the dreamer in the past is evidence of the end of rivalry between friends and the return of their good relationship. Again, in addition to the dreamer’s participation in many life matters. What is the interpretation of being late for school in a single woman’s dream? An unmarried girl who is late for school appears.

title: Interpretation of poison in a dream: seeing drinking poison in a dream

preview.html: Seeing poison for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, drinking, buying, throwing away, putting away food or food. I dreamed that I was poisoned, I drank poisoned food from a snake or scorpion. Interpretation of poison in a dream If a person sees that he drinks poison in a dream, and then that person swells and swells, and there is a change in his facial features as a result, this means a change in the circumstances and condition of the person who sees it completely in terms of To inherit or take money and life and circumstances change with it. As for the dreamer seeing in his dream that he is drinking poison and it does not cause him any harm or change, this means that he will be affected by the disease, God forbid. The poison of a snake, viper, or viper in a dream is praiseworthy in the dream, and whoever He saw poison in his cup or cup, foretelling his injury, a benefit that may be money or power as a result of power or position. If one drinks all the poison from the cup or cup, it means that he is spending his money on goods. If the dreamer sees that he is drinking poison in a dream, and he If the poison tastes bad or bitter, this indicates that the dreamer has committed a sin that he will only repent of in old age. Seeing scorpion venom in a dream is not a good or bad omen. Scorpion venom in a dream indicates harmful and hurtful speech. As for the dream of drinking a scorpion in a dream, it portends committing a sin. As for the one who sees himself taking scorpion venom to heal the disease soon. Whoever sees in a dream that he is giving his friend or friend the black scorpion venom, this means that he will harm him with insulting words or false statements. And seeing him absorbing or swallowing the venom of a scorpion stinger in a dream means that the person will insult an enemy or opponent. Whoever sees that he is spitting poison in a dream, this indicates his marriage to his wife, enemy, or competitor, and seeing him vomiting this poison means divorce or separation and abandonment. Whoever dreams that he drank poison, and it swelled and swelled and pus came out, he will get a lot of money. It was mentioned Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, has many meanings and connotations of seeing poison in general, which may indicate the occurrence of some future events in the dreamer’s real life, with Imam Nabulsi and some commentators, and in this article we will explain the most prominent meanings and connotations that indicate that it is from seeing poison or poisoning, as well as Seeing drinking poison in a dream and a dream, according to what was reported by Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him. Interpretation of eating poison in a dream: Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned about seeing poison in a dream in general that this dream refers to money and obtaining it in its wake, but the meaning of this vision may have something else depending on the condition. His body appeared and signs of a tumor appeared on it, so the vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain sums of money in his waking life from the amount of swelling and swelling that appeared on him in the dream, and it was said: Drinking poison in a dream indicates a long life and a long life. And whoever sees in his dream pus coming out of His body is poisoned, his vision shows the devastation, anxiety and pain he experiences in reality. The worries, distress, and bad situations that accompany him in his real life. The single person who sees in his dream that he is taking poison and drinking it, then his vision shows his close marriage and his exit.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a battle with white weapons

preview.html: What is the opinion of the superior interpreters of this vision and what is its interpretation in all cases? Is the vision worthy of praise or rejected? Interpretation of a dream about a battle with bladed weapons in a dream for one girl. An unmarried girl fights in her dream with bladed weapons with a person she does not know. Evidence that she is exposed to worries and problems for some time, but they will go away. God willing. Seeing her in a dream calming things down with the person she quarreled with is evidence of her inability to control the problems she faces. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream arguing fiercely with her mother until her words are proven true and she is unable to do so. It means that she has been deceived and betrayed. By the people closest to her, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl quarrels with her enemy, she will defeat him, God willing. A single girl’s struggle with weapons, problems and worries dominate her life. Proving the lack of comfort, stability and security. Fighting indicates the random single girl’s personality, which means that she She does not have the ability to make the right decisions. Seeing herself in a dream arguing with people she knows means that there is a person in her life who is causing her harm and loss, and God knows best. The vision is a message from God Almighty that they should beware and take precautions against this person. Either she will fight the girl alone with white rifles. With people she does not know. It means that positive changes will appear in her life that will put her in the best condition, God willing. Arguing with strangers in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will find a new profitable job. Or in the event that they are arguing verbally in the dream. In her problems, she will find no one to answer. For her and she will not be able to reach the goal she wants. See also: Interpretation of seeing a quarrel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a gun fight in a dream for a married woman. A married woman armed in white is quarreling with her husband over her domestic affairs. The evidence of her poor psychological state due to her domestic problems is her husband’s neglect. Arkan: A married woman quarrels for flimsy reasons. But if she is arguing with her children for their own benefit, it is evidence of her care and love for her children so that they have many. Evidence of the fatigue she suffers from in order to reach this goal. A married woman’s quarrel with unknown people she does not know means bad intentions from those around her. General quarrels in a married woman’s dream, marital problems, and disagreements with her husband. Seeing her in a dream arguing with someone and then hitting her in front of her husband. It means the husband’s weak personality and his inability to bear responsibility. This also means that she feels tired and upset because of this weakness and may decide to separate. A quarrel. A married woman with her family is a sign of good news and joyful news. Interpretation of seeing a knife fight in a dream about the man and its meaning. A man quarreling with many people in his dream means abundant livelihood and kindness. Seeing him arguing with his wife in a dream means that there is a love relationship between them. Seeing him in Dreaming that people make him angry until they argue with him. It means hearing happy news about his work or family, God willing. A man’s quarrel with people he does not know in a dream is a good omen and a change in his situation for the better, God willing.

title: Interpretation of tangerines in a dream: Seeing tangerines in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the lingonberry or tangerine fruit, whether yellow or green, peeling, eating, buying, picking, a rotten tree, selling with the peel, to an unmarried girl, to a married woman, to a pregnant woman. By Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of a dream about tangerines in a dream. The commentators said, explaining that they saw tangerines in a dream as building On his condition. If the tangerine is fully ripe, this indicates the presence of sustenance, goodness, and blessing. If the tangerine is not completely ripe or the fruit is still green or rotten, this indicates the presence of illness, envy, or evil. But if a person dreams of seeing a tangerine in a dream and the condition of the tangerine is not ripe or Completely green, it means that this person will bring about a major change in his life or in his field of work and the change will be for the better and for the better. The change can be represented by a wedding, an engagement that ends in marriage, a new job opportunity, or a promotion in the current currency. If one dreams that he saw tangerines in a dream and they were peeled Ready to eat, or placing the tangerine on a clean table, this means that this person will obtain legitimate sustenance from a source he does not know. But if the tangerine is lobed and separated from one part, this indicates that there are problems that will be solved for this person’s family, and they are often due to Hatred of women. Commentators interpreted seeing tangerines in a dream according to their condition, shape, and taste. If tangerines are available in a state of perfect ripeness, good shape, and delicious taste, this indicates the arrival of supply and goodness. If one is poor, he will become rich, and if one is truly rich, he will have more money. Whoever sees himself eating a tangerine, if it tastes sweet, then it indicates money, and if it is sour, it indicates illness. Seeing a ripe and sweet-tasting tangerine, showing a blue color and money, and rot, this or that one who does not eat for whatever reason has a problem with the fruit, Then illness or envy and sadness appear. Green tangerines also indicate the beginning of a new life in the near future, which can be a change in job to a better place, because the green color will mature after that and maturity always looks good, it can be a change of life through marriage, engagement Or the joy that begins with buying them at a later time, such as the gradual ripening of green fruits. Whoever thinks that he is collecting tangerine fruits, if they are edible, will collect money with his work, or it will be the money of the heirs to obtain it, and it may be money that he wants from people. He is desperate to collect them or has forgotten. Whoever sees that he is collecting very large quantities of these fruits will change his place of residence to a better place and live a more luxurious and happy life. As for seeing peeled or unpeeled fruits in a bowl, on a table, or in an eating place, this indicates looting. And money that the dreamer enjoys from a side he did not expect. If the fruit splits in the grooves of its internal parts, this indicates problems, troubles, and separation in the family and between brothers and sisters due to an artificial problem or grudge on the part of the woman. When one sees that he is eating tangerine fruits, this depends on their shape. And its maturity and taste
